articles.title: Many Covid-19 cases are asymptomatic - but how does this happen? - Health24
articles.description: Some people who test positive for the coronavirus never feel sick, and researchers may have found a clue as to why this happens.
articles.content:
• Data shows a large number of people infected with SARS-CoV-2 don't experience any symptoms.
